                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【人民网评：应收尽收，不漏一人！】只有对病患以及疑似病例、密切接触者“应收尽收、不漏一人”，才能真正阻止疫情的蔓延与扩散。当然，“应收尽收、不漏一人”，不只是基于防控病毒传播的理由，它更是一种对于生命与权利的宣示。每一个人的生命都同等重要，也都有得到救治的权利。 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4470001815750625&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gbpxndo7r8j20k10qathx" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263ly1gbpxndo7r8j20k10qathx"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Itn49o801" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4470001815750625:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4470001815750625&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4469996849689742" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmW8EEKa?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 10:02" date="1581213760000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469996849689742:fromprofile"> 2月9日 10:02</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【山东新增确诊病例19例 <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E5%B2%9B%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#青岛公布首例死亡病例情况#</a>】2020年2月8日12-24时，山东省报告新型冠状病毒肺炎新增确诊病例19例，累计确诊病例435例(含重症病例26例，危重症病例6例，治愈出院50例，死亡病例1例);新增疑似病例24例，现有疑似病例88例。截至目前，追踪到密切接触者12422人 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmW8EEKa" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469996849689742:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469996849689742&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【报名参加！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8C%BB%E7%96%97%E9%98%9F%E5%87%BA%E5%BE%81%E5%90%8D%E5%8D%951%E5%B0%8F%E6%97%B6%E5%B0%B1%E6%95%B2%E5%AE%9A%23&amp;from=default">#医疗队出征名单1小时就敲定#</a>】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%B8%82%E7%AC%AC%E4%B8%80%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E5%AE%98%E5%BE%AE?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=南京市第一医院官微">@南京市第一医院官微</a> 组建赴武汉医疗队消息发出，大家纷纷报名。仅仅一个小时后，2名领队，54名医护人员名单确定。网友：愿你们整整齐齐地去，整整齐齐地回！ <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=南京日报">@南京日报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        【学知识赢红包！快来参加“人民战疫总动员”答题游戏】<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a> ，关于新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情，你了解多少？你是这场“战疫”的合格战士吗？目前，人民网人民好医生APP推出“人民战疫总动员”科普知识答题小游戏，旨在通过答题的方式，宣传正确的防疫知识，并缓解公众过于紧张的心理 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmTcFsE6" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469995029881566:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469995029881566&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：为了人民的利益，继续奋勇争先】疫情上报“第一人”张继先认识到问题严重，便将收治的疑似病例单独隔离起来。事后证明，这个决断无比正确。截至2月初，张继先和她的团队无一人感染，奇迹背后，与她未雨绸缪息息相关。这种专业能力并不是凭空生成，而是来自日常的锤炼，来自对职业的敬重， ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4469993234742617&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gbpwppvilzj20go0b4wfw" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263ly1gbpwppvilzj20go0b4wfw"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmQjjTLP" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469993234742617:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469993234742617&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

    </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609333889&amp;ssig=VrC%2B%2BJYpvh" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469990805842319" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmMoovQX?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 09:38" date="1581212319000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469990805842319:fromprofile"> 2月9日 09:38</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E4%B8%9C%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B45%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A11120%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广东新增病例45例累计1120例#</a>】截至2月8日24时，全省累计报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例1120例。2月8日当天全省新增确诊病例45例。新增确诊病例中，深圳市13例、广州市6例、惠州市6例、中山市5例、佛山市5例、茂名市3例、江门市3例、东莞市2例、珠海市1例、湛江市1例。另有 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmMoovQX" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469990805842319:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469990805842319&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4469990025429909" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmL8mMzb?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 09:35" date="1581212132000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469990025429909:fromprofile"> 2月9日 09:35</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a> 【全国多处地标建筑元宵节亮灯为武汉加油】2月8日，农历正月十五，元宵佳节。北京、天津、重庆、郑州、南京、上海等全国多地城市地标亮灯。这个不一样的元宵夜，各地为武汉抗“疫”点亮的希望之灯，格外明亮耀眼，倍感暖心提气！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8A%A0%E6%B2%B9%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#加油武汉#</a>！加油中国！<a title="全国多处地标建筑元宵节亮灯为武汉加油" href="http://t.cn/A6PFx8Zy" alt="http://t.cn/A6PFx8Zy" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>全国多处地标建筑元宵节亮灯为武汉加油</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4469990025429909"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>150</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=6157029707&amp;cid=4469995352069754&amp;nick=只能在死海游泳&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月9日 09:56</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469989153653758" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmJJfkvA?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 09:32" date="1581211925000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469989153653758:fromprofile"> 2月9日 09:32</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9D%92%E6%B5%B7%E7%9C%81%E8%BF%9E%E7%BB%AD3%E5%A4%A9%E6%97%A0%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#青海省连续3天无新增病例#</a>】据青海省卫健委，2月8日0-24时，青海省报告新型冠状病毒肺炎新增确诊病例0例，新增重症病例0例，新增死亡病例0例，新增出院病例0例。当日无新增确诊病例和疑似病例。已连续三天无新增病例。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;截至2月8日24时，青海省累计报告新型冠状病毒肺炎确 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmJJfkvA" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469989153653758:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469989153653758&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                 <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>
    <!-- 一级评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469987387768483" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmGSwAW7?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 09:25" date="1581211503000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469987387768483:fromprofile"> 2月9日 09:25</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【宁夏新增确诊病例1例 订正排除1例】2月9日，宁夏应对新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情工作指挥部发布最新全区新型冠状病毒肺炎疫情通报。<br>2020年2月8日0-24时，全区报告新增确诊病例1例，订正排除确诊病例1例，累计确诊病例数无变化。<br>截至2月8日24时，全区累计报告确诊病例45例，其中银川市 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmGSwAW7" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469987387768483:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469987387768483&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4469986594659207" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmFBjy4v?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 09:21" date="1581211314000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469986594659207:fromprofile"> 2月9日 09:21</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A6%88%E5%A6%88%E6%88%91%E7%BB%99%E6%82%A8%E6%95%AC%E4%B8%AA%E7%A4%BC%23&amp;from=default">#妈妈我给您敬个礼#</a>！<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/ee/2018new_beishang_org.png" title="[悲伤]" alt="[悲伤]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】山西省万荣县公安局交通警察大队辅警蔡蓉一直在疫情防控一线执勤，她跟妈妈说好的初三回家，可总也不回。妈妈太想女儿了，她给女儿包好饺子，拿上苹果，从30里外的村里来到女儿的执勤点看她。送完东西转身离开，女儿给她敬了一个礼。致敬所有一线防疫工作者！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%96%B0%E5%8D%8E%E8%A7%86%E7%82%B9?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=新华视点">@新华视点</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmFBjy4v" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469986594659207:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469986594659207&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/ItmARAjua&amp;mid=4469983658654714&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263gy1gbpvn0xczoj20rv0mpjyu" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>26</em></span></span></span></a>

                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月9日 09:05</div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B2%B3%E5%8C%97%E4%B8%80%E9%9A%90%E7%9E%92%E7%97%85%E6%83%85%E8%80%85%E5%8E%BB%E4%B8%96%23&amp;from=default">#河北一隐瞒病情者去世#</a>，失去最佳治疗机会，密切接触人员77人】记者9日从河北邢台市获悉，2月7日确诊的河北邢台市内丘县隐瞒事实病例由于病程长（1月18日发病），隐瞒病史，失去最佳治疗机会，终因新冠肺炎致多脏器衰竭，经抢救无效于昨晚8点左右死亡。<br><br>此前，河北邢台应对新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Itmwbrw3T" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469980756558105:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469980756558105&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%AE%89%E5%BE%BD%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#安徽首例死亡病例#</a> 患者既往有慢性阻塞性肺疾病、高血压病】死亡病例病情介绍：患者赵某某，男，87岁, 蚌埠人，1月30日确诊为新冠肺炎，入住蚌医一附院（省级新冠肺炎重症集中收治基地医院），临床为危重型。患者既往有慢性阻塞性肺疾病、高血压病3级（极高危）、冠状动脉粥样硬 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmuYlCcO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469980005151754:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469980005151754&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                         <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 二级评论 -->
        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->
    </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%BB%A5%E5%A4%96%E5%9C%B0%E5%8C%BA%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E6%95%B0%E8%BF%9E%E9%99%8D5%E5%A4%A9%23&amp;from=default">#湖北以外地区新增病例数连降5天#</a>】据国家卫健委数据统计，2月8日0—24时，全国湖北以外地区新增确诊病例509例，连续第5日呈下降态势。而过去5日这一数据分别为：890例(3日)、731例(4日)、707例(5日)、696例(6日)，558例（7日）。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B1%9F%E8%8B%8F%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E29%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A468%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#江苏新增29例累计确诊468例#</a>】2020年2月8日0-24时，江苏省报告新型冠状病毒肺炎新增确诊病例29例。其中，轻型病例5例，普通型病例24例。新增出院病例8例。<br><br>新增确诊病例中，南京市6例、无锡市4例、徐州市4例、苏州市3例、南通市1例、连云港市5例、淮安市4例、扬州市1例、镇江市 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmsjaGML" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469978352547751:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469978352547751&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609333898&amp;ssig=JnTSRT3hK5" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469977861792316" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Itmrw7wgk?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 08:47" date="1581209233000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469977861792316:fromprofile"> 2月9日 08:47</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B6%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1292%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#上海新增病例6例累计292例#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B712320?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=健康上海12320">@健康上海12320</a> ，2月8日12—24时，上海市排除新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疑似病例88例；新增确诊病例6例，其中1例为外地来沪人员，5例为本市常住人口。<br>　　截至2月8日24时，上海市已累计排除疑似病例965例，发现确诊病例292例。确诊病例中，男性155例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Itmrw7wgk" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469977861792316:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469977861792316&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8D%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A35%E4%BE%8B%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A240%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#湖南新增确诊35例新增出院40例#</a>】2020年2月8日0-24时,湖南省报告新型冠状病毒肺炎新增确诊病例35例,新增重症病例2例,新增死亡病例1例,新增出院病例40例。其中:<br>  新增确诊病例中,长沙市9例、衡阳市2例、株洲市10例、邵阳市1例、岳阳市4例、益阳市2例、郴州市1例、怀化市1例、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmqeCk8o" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469977069133864:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469977069133864&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    </li>

                                <a name="4469976481975962" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Itmpi8i2m?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 08:41" date="1581208904000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469976481975962:fromprofile"> 2月9日 08:41</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【河南新增病例53例累计1033例】河南卫健委通报，2月8日0-24时，河南省新增新型冠状病毒肺炎确诊病例53例，新增出院病例34例，新增死亡病例2例。新增确诊病例中，信阳市13例、商丘市7例（含永城市2例）、郑州市6例、南阳市5例、鹤壁市4例、焦作市4例、开封市3例、驻马店市3例、平顶 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Itmpi8i2m" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469976481975962:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469976481975962&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->
                
				 
    <!--picture_count == 2-->

                                <a name="4469975282837638" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmnmbUcm?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 08:36" date="1581208618000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469975282837638:fromprofile"> 2月9日 08:36</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A22649%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国累计治愈出院2649例#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=健康中国">@健康中国</a>，2月8日0时至24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团新增治愈出院600例（湖北324例），解除医学观察的密切接触者31124人，累计治愈出院病例2649例。 ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609333898&amp;ssig=JnTSRT3hK5" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469972753393841" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmjheeTn?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 08:26" date="1581208014000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469972753393841:fromprofile"> 2月9日 08:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B2656%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A137198%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国新增病例2656例累计37198例#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%81%A5%E5%BA%B7%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=健康中国">@健康中国</a> 2月8日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告，新增确诊病例2656例（湖北2147例），新增重症病例87例（湖北52例），新增死亡病例89例（湖北81例，河南2例，河北、黑龙江、安徽、山东、湖南、广西各1例），新增 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmjheeTn" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469972753393841:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469972753393841&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <!-- 赞 -->
                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月9日 08:34</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469971516349520" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmhhqDNC?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 08:21" date="1581207719000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469971516349520:fromprofile"> 2月9日 08:21</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%A5%BF%E5%AE%89%E4%B8%80%E8%82%AF%E5%BE%B7%E5%9F%BA%E5%89%8D%E5%8F%B0%E5%BA%97%E5%91%98%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%23&amp;from=default">#西安一肯德基前台店员确诊#</a> 活动轨迹公布】 据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E8%A5%BF%E5%AE%89%E5%8F%91%E5%B8%83?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=西安发布">@西安发布</a> ，西安市雁塔区新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情防控指挥部办公办室对一名新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎患者进行流行病学调查追踪时发现，该患者于2020年1月12日乘坐K1131次（4号车厢108座位）从郑州到西安，到西安火车站后于16:00—1 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmhhqDNC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469971516349520:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469971516349520&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3014021403" usercard="id=3014021403">Italeri艺术瓷砖</a>：不是我没有信心，我感觉再有14天疫情也不会得到有效控制，毕竟中国太大了，人太多了        </div>
                <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>

        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469970468070415" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItmfAxRtZ?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-09 08:17" date="1581207470000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469970468070415:fromprofile"> 2月9日 08:17</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8F%91%E7%83%A7%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E9%A9%BE%E8%BD%A6%E9%80%83%E7%A6%BB%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#发烧患者驾车逃离医院#</a> 警方全城布控现场苦劝】2月7日晚，山西河津人民医院报警称，隔离病房内一名发烧患者驾车逃离医院。警方立即全城布控搜寻车辆，同时民警通过电话与患者联系。取得信任后，民警到场与患者面对面沟通、耐心劝解，极力帮助患者解决疑虑。最终患者同意回院接受隔离治疗。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItmfAxRtZ" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469970468070415:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469970468070415&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a> 【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B9%BF%E8%A5%BF%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A12%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1195%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#广西新增确诊12例累计195例#</a>】2月8日0-24时，我区共新增新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎确诊病例12例，其中南宁市3例、北海市1例、河池市4例、来宾市4例。新增治愈出院病例1例（梧州市1例），新增死亡病例1例（河池市都安县1例）。<br><br>目前全区累计报告确诊病例195例，累计出院病例18例。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Itmcbfssu" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469968353684318:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469968353684318&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                            <div comment_id="4469968085478737" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">
                <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B2147%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A127100%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#湖北新增病例2147例累计27100例#</a>】湖北卫健委通报，2月8日0时-24时，湖北省新增新型冠状病毒肺炎病例2147例，其中：武汉市1379例、孝感市123例、黄冈市100例、襄阳市81例、宜昌市78例、荆门市75例、鄂州市70例、黄石市57例、荆州市56例、随州市31例、十堰市29例、仙桃市20例、天 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Itm494P9x" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469963371149947:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469963371149947&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->
                
				 
    <!--picture_count == 2-->

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E4%B8%A4%E5%A4%A9%E5%86%85%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E5%AE%8C%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E6%89%80%E6%9C%89%E7%96%91%E4%BC%BC%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#湖北两天内检测完武汉所有疑似患者#</a>】2月8日，湖北省委书记、省新冠肺炎疫情防控指挥部指挥长蒋超良在武汉市督导疫情防控工作。会上他要求集中两天时间将全武汉市累积的所有疑似患者检测完毕，释放医护力量和医疗资源，集中用于确诊患者。<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6PkWWwJ" alt="http://t.cn/A6PkWWwJ" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5108153673" usercard="id=5108153673">黄升金金</a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member5"></em></a>：最大的敌人不是病毒，而是体制。12月1日发现第一例病例，还把“吹哨人”给抓了，直到1月20启动一级卫生事件。中间浪费时间可以挽救多少人        </div>

                                                                <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" action-data="cid=4470007591751700&amp;is_more=1&amp;type=small&amp;ouid=" action-type="commentDialogue">查看对话</a></span></li>
                                                                <!-- 查看对话 -->
                                <!-- 回复 -->
                                <li>

        <!-- 对评论的操作 -->

            <div class="WB_handle W_fr">
                <ul class="clearfix">
                    <!-- 投诉 -->
                                        <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=ItiLu1V47&amp;type=2&amp;url=&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=6', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 投诉 -->
                    <!-- 屏蔽 -->

                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=5919495882&amp;screen_name=别惹容嬷嬷" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>

                    <!-- 删除 -->

                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>

                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                                                                                                                                        【心相念 护家园 盼团圆<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/6d/feiyan_dianliangpingan_org.png" title="[点亮平安灯]" alt="[点亮平安灯]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】春节甫过，春风渐起。愿疫情也能快快退散，成为过往。天气暖了，月亮圆了。愿天各一方的我们也能尽早解除隔离，相聚团圆。春天草木可爱，一切都会好起来。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a> ​​​​                                                            </div>

                                                    <li class=" curr">
                                            <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" action-type="fl_comment" action-data="ouid=2286908003&amp;location=profile&amp;comment_type=0" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=comment:4469827823338595"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="comment_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_repeat S_ficon"></em><em>86</em></span></span></span></a>
                                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_line1"></i><em class="S_bg1_br"></em></span></span>
                </li>
                <li class="">
                    <!--cuslike用于前端判断是否显示个性赞，1:显示-->

            </ul>
        </div>
    </div>

    <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/5525484136" usercard="id=5525484136">Alice王美人</a>：呼吁彻查卫健委第一批专家组！他们自称，自己的这一研究过程“是完美的工作"。这帮专家们席卷了全部疫情数据，而后对人传人的事实遮遮掩掩，瞒着不报。 于是我们都听到了：“可防可控”，“不会人传人”！言之凿凿。但话音未落，专家组组长、北大医院呼吸科主任王广发就发现感染了这种新型病毒。        </div>

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=6660181241&amp;screen_name=有在好好生活吧" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月8日 22:51</div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2387%E5%B2%81%E9%80%80%E5%BD%B9%E5%86%9B%E4%BA%BA%E6%8B%84%E6%8B%90%E6%8D%90%E6%AC%BE%23&amp;from=default">#87岁退役军人拄拐捐款#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月8日一大早，家住黄冈黄州区的87岁的马婆婆，拄着手杖在儿子的搀扶下来到派出所，为黄冈“防治新型冠状病毒”捐款。据悉，马婆婆曾是一名孤儿，由党和政府抚养长大。尽管退休金微薄，行动又不便，但马婆婆还是坚持送出自己的一份爱心。离开之际， ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItiscukDo" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469824527229162:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469824527229162&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609333906&amp;ssig=i7DXxP%2BSe2" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469821711905229" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItinF7ZDv?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-08 22:26" date="1581172003000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469821711905229:fromprofile"> 2月8日 22:26</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【温暖！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E8%BE%85%E8%AD%A6%E4%B8%BA%E8%BF%B7%E8%B7%AF%E8%80%81%E4%BA%BA%E6%88%B4%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%23&amp;from=default">#南京辅警为迷路老人戴口罩#</a>】5日14时许，<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E5%B9%B3%E5%AE%89%E6%96%B0%E6%B1%9F%E5%8C%97?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=平安新江北">@平安新江北</a> 辅警巡逻途中发现一老人推着车在马路中间走，立刻上前。询问得知，老人家在大桥方向，走反了方向。辅警为老人指了方向，发现老人没戴口罩，拿出自己的新口罩帮老人戴上，暖心叮嘱：要保护好自己！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItinF7ZDv" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469821711905229:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469821711905229&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">
            <div class="between_line S_bg1"></div>

        </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4469819564546724" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Itikcj4Og?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-08 22:18" date="1581171492000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469819564546724:fromprofile"> 2月8日 22:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E8%BE%BD%E5%AE%81500%E5%90%8D%E5%8C%BB%E6%8A%A4%E5%85%83%E5%AE%B5%E5%A4%9C%E9%A3%9E%E8%B5%B4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#辽宁500名医护元宵夜飞赴武汉#</a>】2月8日元宵夜，500名医护人员从大连出发乘四架包机飞赴武汉，以全力支援湖北医疗救治。据悉，2月9日，另500名医护人员也将从沈阳出发驰援武汉。他们舍弃团圆的元宵节，奔赴疫情一线，致敬<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E9%80%86%E8%A1%8C%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#疫情中的逆行者#</a>，愿平安凯旋！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E8%BE%BD%E5%AE%81%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网辽宁频道">@人民网辽宁频道</a> <a title="元宵夜，辽宁500名医护人员乘4架包机飞赴武汉" href="http://t.cn/A6PkMwkx" alt="http://t.cn/A6PkMwkx" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>元宵夜，辽宁500名医护人员乘4架包机飞赴武汉</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                <a name="4469816100615775" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/ItieC2AbR?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-08 22:04" date="1581170666000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4469816100615775:fromprofile"> 2月8日 22:04</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%A0%B8%E9%85%B8%E6%A3%80%E6%B5%8B%E5%81%87%E9%98%B4%E6%80%A7%E7%9A%845%E7%A7%8D%E5%8F%AF%E8%83%BD%E6%80%A7%23&amp;from=default">#核酸检测假阴性的5种可能性#</a>】2月7日，有消息称中日医院收治了一名3次咽拭子检测均为阴性、通过下呼吸道样本才确诊新冠肺炎的患者。这种案例是否普遍存在？假阴性的比例高吗？2月8日，人民网专访武汉大学中南医院影像科副主任张笑春。核酸检测假阴性背后的5种可能性：①核酸采样存在局限性，通常采 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/ItieC2AbR" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4469816100615775:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4469816100615775&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

    <div class="WB_face W_fl">
        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3974555295"><img alt="安徒生的未完童话" src="https://tvax1.sinaimg.cn/crop.0.12.750.750.1024/ece6e69fly8ff5xur1xphj20ku0lidi6.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609334075&amp;ssig=kkwPFZShRu" usercard="id=3974555295"></a>

    <!-- 评论头像 -->
    <!-- 评论用户信息及评论内容 -->
    <div class="list_con" node-type="replywrap">
        <div class="WB_text">
            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/3974555295" usercard="id=3974555295">安徒生的未完童话</a>：假阴性假阳性的存在是必要的，要多手段去检测，核酸检测、影像、表观病症观察一起到位。治愈患者转阴也不要轻视，别到时候出现阴性是因为检测限没达到，那出院问题就更大了。        </div>
                <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->
                                            <div class="WB_expand_media_box" style="display: none;" node-type="comment_media_disp"></div>
                            <!-- 评论图片的处理 -->

                                            <li class="hover"><span class="line S_line1"><a class="S_txt1" action-type="shieldComment" action-data="id=7069813419&amp;screen_name=港湾傻事" href="javascript:void(0);">屏蔽</a></span></li>
                                        <!-- 屏蔽 -->
                    <!-- 删除 -->
                                        <!-- 删除 -->
                    <!-- 查看对话 -->

                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>
                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=7069813419&amp;cid=4469813696775312&amp;nick=港湾傻事&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>
                        <span class="arrow"><span class="W_arrow_bor W_arrow_bor_t"><i class="S_bg2_br"></i></span></span>
                    </li>
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <!-- 赞 -->
                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

                </ul>
            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月8日 21:54</div>

，关于新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情，你了解多少？你是这场“战疫”的合格战士吗？目前，人民网人民好医生APP推出“人民战疫总动员”科普知识答题小游戏，旨在通过答题的方式，宣传正确的防疫知识，并缓解公众过于紧张的心理 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/2286908003\/ItmTcFsE6\" 【全国多处地标建筑元宵节亮灯为武汉加油】2月8日，农历正月十五，元宵佳节。北京、天津、重庆、郑州、南京、上海等全国多地城市地标亮灯。这个不一样的元宵夜，各地为武汉抗“疫”点亮的希望之灯，格外明亮耀眼，倍感暖心提气！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\"                                 <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_next" action-type="next" title="下一首"></a>
                                <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_loop" node-type="play_type" action-type="play_type" title="列表循环"></a>
                            </div>
                            <div class="vol_ctrl">
                                <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_vol" title="音量" action-type="toggle_mute" node-type="toggle_mute"></a>
                                <div class="ctrl_bar" node-type="volume_range_out">
                                    <div class="cur_vol cur_volmute" style="width: 90%;" node-type="volume_range">

                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>

                                <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_like" action-type="like" node-type="like"></a>

                            </div>
                        </div>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="fold_ctrl_area" title="展开" action-type="toggle_fold" node-type="toggle_fold"><div class="mask"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_unfold ico_fold"></a></div></div>
        <div class="lyric_wrap" node-type="lrc" style="display:none">
    <div class="lyric_bg">
        <a href="javascript:void(0);" class="ico_ctrl ico_close" title="关闭" action-type="toggle_lrc"></a>
